amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit any funds appropriated in the bill for the Army Corps of Engineers to be used to revise the Missouri River Master Control Manual.

action.text: Mr. McDade raised a point of order against the Bereuter amendment (A005). Mr. McDade stated that the provisions of the amendment would change existing law and, therefore, constituted legislation on an Appropriations bill, in violation of the rules of the House. The Chair sustained the point of order.
